# iosxr_mac_set (Resource)

This resource can manage the Mac Set configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_mac_set" "example" {
  set_name = "MAC1"
  rpl      = "mac-set MAC1\n  0011.2233.4455,\n  2233.4455.5566\nend-set\n"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `rpl` (String) Configures a MAC set
- `set_name` (String) Set name

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_mac_set.example "<set_name>"
```
